abstract: Commodities and technology stocks, which have helped fuel a three-month rally, led the market in a modest pullback early Friday.
snippet: Commodities and technology stocks, which have helped fuel a three-month rally, led the market in a modest pullback early Friday.
lead_paragraph: Stocks advanced, erasing the Dow Jones industrial average’s 2009 loss, as Bank of America rallied on higher profit estimates and investors bought shares of utilities and phone companies.

headline.print_headline: Shares Rise, Erasing Dow’s Loss for ’09
